verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, an apostle<WG652> (not<WG3756> from<WG575> men<WG444>, neither<WG3761> through<WG1223> man<WG444>, but<WG235> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962>, who<WG3588> raised<WG1453> him<WG846> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>),
and <WG2532> all<WG3956> the brethren<WG80> that are<WG3588> with<WG4862> me<WG1698>, unto the churches<WG1577> of Galatia<WG1053>:
Grace <WG5485> to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> from<WG575> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962>, and<WG2532> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>,

who <WG3588> gave<WG1325> himself<WG1438> for<WG5228> our<WG2257> sins<WG266>, that<WG3704> he might deliver<WG1807> us<WG2248> out<WG1537> of this<WG3588> present<WG1764> evil<WG4190> world<WG165>, according to<WG2596> the will<WG2307> of our<WG2257> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962>:
to whom<WG3739> be the glory<WG1391> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

I marvel<WG2296> that<WG3754> ye are<WG3346> so<WG3779> quickly<WG5030> removing<WG3346> from<WG575> him that<WG3588> called<WG2564> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the grace<WG5485> of Christ<WG5547> unto<WG1519> a different<WG2087> gospel<WG2098>;

which <WG3739> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> another<WG1487> gospel only<WG3361> there are<WG1526> some<WG5100> that<WG3588> trouble<WG5015> you<WG5209>, and<WG2532> would<WG2309> pervert<WG3344> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ<WG5547>.

But235, 2532 though<WG1437> we<WG2249>, or<WG2228> an angel<WG32> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, should preach unto you<WG5213> any gospel<WG2097> other than<WG3844> that which<WG3739> we preached<WG2097> unto you<WG5213>, let him be<WG2077> anathema<WG331>.

As <WG5613> we have said before<WG4280>, so<WG2532> say I<WG3004> now<WG737> again<WG3825>, if<WG1487> any<WG5100> man preacheth unto you<WG5209> any gospel<WG2097> other than<WG3844> that<WG3739> which ye received<WG3880>, let him be<WG2077> anathema<WG331>.

For <WG1063> am I<WG3982> now<WG737> seeking the favor<WG3982> of men<WG444>, or<WG2228> of God<WG2316>? or<WG2228> am I striving<WG2212> to please<WG700> men<WG444>? <WG1063> if<WG1487> I<WG700> were still<WG2089> pleasing<WG700> men<WG444>, I should<WG302> not<WG3756> be<WG2252> a servant<WG1401> of Christ<WG5547>.

For <WG1161> I make known<WG1107> to you<WG5213>, brethren<WG80>, as touching<WG3588> the gospel<WG2098> which<WG3588> was preached<WG2097> by<WG5259> me<WG1700>, that<WG3754> it is<WG2076> not<WG3756> after<WG2596> man<WG444>.

For <WG1063> neither<WG3761> did I<WG1473> receive<WG3880> it<WG846> from man<WG444>, nor was I<WG1473> taught<WG1321> it<WG846>, but<WG235> it came to me through<WG1223> revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

For <WG1063> ye have heard of<WG191> my<WG1699> manner of life<WG391> in time past<WG4218> in<WG1722> the Jews<WG2454>' religion, how that<WG3754> beyond<WG2596> measure<WG5236> I persecuted<WG1377> the church<WG1577> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> made havoc<WG4199> of it<WG846>:

and <WG2532> I advanced<WG4298> in<WG1722> the Jews<WG2454>' religion beyond<WG5228> many<WG4183> of mine own age<WG4915> among<WG1722> my<WG3450> countrymen<WG1085>, being<WG5225> more exceedingly<WG4056> zealous<WG2207> for the traditions<WG3967> of my<WG3450> fathers<WG3862>.

But <WG1161> when<WG3753> it was the good pleasure<WG2106> of God<WG2316>, who<WG3588> separated<WG873> me<WG3165>, even from<WG1537> my<WG3450> mother<WG3384>'s womb<WG2836>, and<WG2532> called<WG2564> me through<WG1223> his<WG846> grace<WG5485>,

to reveal<WG601> his<WG846> Son<WG5207> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>, that<WG2443> I might preach<WG2097> him<WG846> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG1484>; straightway<WG2112> I conferred<WG4323> not<WG3756> with flesh<WG4561> and<WG2532> blood<WG129>:

neither <WG3761> went I up<WG424> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> to<WG4314> them that were<WG3588> apostles<WG652> before<WG4253> me<WG1700>: but<WG235> I went<WG565> away into<WG1519> Arabia<WG688>; and<WG2532> again<WG3825> I returned<WG5290> unto<WG1519> Damascus<WG1154>.

Then <WG1899> after<WG3326> three<WG5140> years<WG2094> I went up<WG424> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> to visit<WG2477> Cephas<WG4074>, and<WG2532> tarried<WG1961> with<WG4314> him<WG846> fifteen<WG1178> days<WG2250>.
But <WG1161> other<WG2087> of the apostles<WG652> saw I<WG1492> none<WG3756>, save<WG1508> James<WG2385> the<WG80> Lord<WG2962>'s brother<WG80>.
Now <WG1161> touching the things which<WG3739> I write<WG1125> unto you<WG5213>, behold<WG2400>, before<WG1799> God<WG2316>, I lie5574, 3754 not<WG3756>.
Then <WG1899> I came<WG2064> unto<WG1519> the regions<WG2824> of Syria<WG4947> and<WG2532> Cilicia<WG2791>.
And <WG1161> I was<WG2252> still unknown<WG50> by face<WG4383> unto the churches<WG1577> of Judaea<WG2449> which were<WG3588> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>:

but <WG1161> they<WG2258> only<WG3440> heard<WG191> say<WG3754>, He that<WG3588> once<WG4218> persecuted<WG1377> us<WG2248> now<WG3568> preacheth<WG2097> the faith<WG4102> of which<WG3739> he once<WG4218> made havoc<WG4199>;
and <WG2532> they glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>.
